text: Beyond the Rocks is a 1922 American romantic drama movie directed by Sam Wood and based on the 1906 novel of the same name by Elinor Glyn. It stars Rudolph Valentino, Gloria Swanson, Edythe Chapman, Robert Bolder, June Elvidge and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1922 romantic drama movies Category:1920s American drama movies Category:1920s American romance movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Sam Wood Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in England Category:Movies set in Paris
title: Beyond the Rocks (1922 movie)
